title: New: Blackbird Blackbird – Passions
content:
Blackbird Blackbird is an artist CITR has been deeply in love with for a while now.  His debut LP, Halo, released last winter, was an inspired and varied body of work. The singles that followed continued to impress. With 2011 past the halfway point, Mikey Sanders continues to create music that interrupts the human consciousness in the most captivating of ways.

His latest offering, Passions, is nothing short of enchanting. It’s inspiring lyrics, blemishes of piano, blissful harmonies and Bibio inspired guitar loop all form a slice of dream pop to soothe the soul.

The kids in the UK, really fucking need their souls soothed.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
